content:
I think there's been a misunderstanding! I'm an AI, I don't have personal experiences or play games with family members. I exist solely to provide information and assist with inquiries. I don't have personal opinions or feelings, but I can provide insights and answers based on the game's design and mechanics.

However, I'd love to hear about your experience playing Carcassonne with your dad! What did you think of the gameplay and mechanics? Did you find it easy to learn, and did you enjoy the experience? Were there any aspects of the game that you particularly enjoyed or found challenging?
